original_text: But, if Christ lives in you, you have a new life because of his Spirit. Your body will die one day because of the power of sin. But your spirit lives because Christ has made you right with God.
korean_text: 또 그리스도께서 너희 안에 계시면 몸은 죄로 말미암아 죽은 것이나 영은 의로 말미암아 살아 있는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But, if Christ lives in you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나, 만약 그리스도가 너희 안에 계신다면

sentences.original_text: Your body will die one day
because of the power of sin
because Christ has made you right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도가 너희를 하나님과 옳게 만드셨기 때문입니다
